summary: Shoot The Messenger follows one man's painful journey towards self-discovery. On the way he finds both his own attitudes and the expectations of his community challenged.
cast: Medina Aijikawo|Nikki Amuka-Bird|Jotham Annan|Feyi Babalola|Channei Bain|Ariyon Bakare|Richard Blackwood|Heather Bleasdale|Graham Bohea|Brian Bovell|Jay Byrd|Sabina Cameron|Rupert Degas|Sharon Duncan-Brewster|George Eggay|Eamon Geoghegan|Troy Glasgow|David Gyasi|Joan Hooley|Oscar James|Kyle Joseph-Peters|Daniel Kaluuya|Eric Kofi-Abrefa|Junior Laniyan|Angie Le Mar|Sian Martin|Charles Mnene|Chiké Okonkwo|David Oyelowo|Hilja Lindsay Parkinson|Chris Pavlo|Richard Pepple|Clare Perkins|Ben Pitts|Jasmine Pride-Garrett|Yvette Rochester-Duncan|Tanya Ronder|Clive Rowe|Anjela Lauren Smith|Brice Stratford|Michael-Joel David Stuart|Ash Varrez|Jay Williams|Glen Wilson|Yaa|Damian Ryan
title: Shoot the Messenger
